resources.string: Learn the Concepts that drive design thinking.
Submit your Project ideas around user innovations.
Identify Customer needs and User groups.
Analyze the economics of the innovation.
Present your final ideas, get real-time feedback.
The important element as well as first stage of design thinking to gain an empathetic understanding of people to solve the problem.
Define:- Put information together which created during emphathise stage.\nIdeation:- Get ready to start generating ideas.\nPrototyping:- The experimental phase to identify the best possible solution.
TESTING PROTOTYPES AND FEEDBACK FROM USERS
The final stage of the five stage model but in an iterative process.

• App and add-ons: An app for vending machines and additions required to implement it, it deals with IOT and machine to human interaction, the utility management of the machine and add-ons to implement the proposed idea. \n\n• Models and prototype: Implementation and feasibility. Working prototype for the app.

1. Students will practice a design thinking process for innovation which can leads to some good entrepreneurship ideas or projects.

 2. It will help the students to get in touch with the real world problems.

 3. Students will become familiar with the process of ideation followed by top institutes across the world.

 4. Students will learn the techniques of prototyping their ideas.

 5. Students will learn how to find opportunities in the real world for entrepreneurship projects.

 6. Students will be involved in collaborative and creative learning.

Design thinking is a framework for innovation. Most of the prestigious institutions like Stanford , Harvard and top companies like SAP Google etc across the world follow this framework to create different products based on their customers needs and requirements. This workshop will help the students to work on real world problems and will make them familiar with the entire design thinking process. This workshop will also help the students in generating different entrepreneurship ideas and also help them to think on it in a mature manner. \n\nThis workshop will be followed by an idea presentation and prototyping challenge based on their 3 week effort. The winner of this competition will get a prize. The prize will be decided later on as per the evaluation panel.
